docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is currently in development and is not the default version. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or entering api/v2/ in the URL.

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: create
examples:
POST /api/hostgroups
{
  "hostgroup": {
    "name": "TestHostgroup"
  }
}
200
{
  "id": 928644288,
  "name": "TestHostgroup",
  "label": "TestHostgroup",
  "subnet_id": null,
  "subnet_name": null,
  "operatingsystem_id": null,
  "operatingsystem_name": null,
  "domain_id": null,
  "domain_name": null,
  "environment_id": null,
  "environment_name": null,
  "compute_profile_id": null,
  "compute_profile_name": null,
  "ancestry": null,
  "parameters": {},
  "puppetclass_ids": []
}

methods.name: update

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:

  "hostgroup": {}
}
